item.description:
Join the Boston Center for Adult Education, the American Australian Association, and Wine Australia's James Gosper for the discovery of the key wine regions of the smallest continent and exploration into the diversity of Australia's wine regions. We will look at the "terroir" of 6 - 8 key regions from the east to the west Coast, and taste the "regional hero" varietals from each region.

Thursday, 6:00 PM - 7:30 PM; 1 session on February 25, 2010
Tuition: $25.00 Member Cost: $20.00

Boston Center for Adult Education
122 Arlington Street
Boston, MA 02116

By MBTA: Take the MBTA Green Line to the Arlington Street stop. Exit onto Arlington Street, keeping the Public Garden behind you and walk approximately 3 blocks, toward Park Plaza. 122 Arlington Street is on the left, across the street from Smith & Wollensky in the Castle.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Regional Heroes: Wine from Australia
